message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about using linked entities to improve the performance of a neural text summarizer. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves the use of a knowledge base, which suggests the possibility of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves attention mechanisms, which are commonly used in neural networks for information retrieval, suggesting the possibility of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper involves improving the effectiveness of an off-the-shelf entity linking system, which suggests the possibility of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
